sources.title: Blonde in Bondage (1957) SWEDE UNDERWORLD
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Mark Miller, Lars Ekborg, Anita Thallaug
Director: Robert Brandt

Don’t be misled by the title. You won’t find Mondo Bondage here. But you will see an abundance of Beautiful Blondes in this juicy Crime Import from Sweden.  A New York City journalist tangles with a gang of ruthless underworld jerks when sent to Stockholm for an exposé on the city’s decadent cabaret scene.

TRIVIA: Mark Miller is the father of actress Penelope Ann Miller.

metadata.Plot: American reporter doing a story on Swedish nightlife gets involved with a drug-addicted nightclub singer.
metadata.Actors: Mark Miller, Lars Ekborg, Anita Thallaug
